tika-s0304t9:3_1: Aṅgulimuddāya gaṇanāya kusaloti aṅgulikāya eva gaṇanāya kusalo seyyathāpi pādasikā.
tika-s0304t9:3_4: tathāgataṁ sandhāya pucchatīti khīṇāsavoti cassa arahattaphalavasibhāvitakhandhe upādāya ayaṁ paññatti hoti.
tika-s0304t9:3_5: Tesu khandhesu sati khīṇāsavā sattasaṅkhātā hontīti vohārena paññapetuṁ sakkā bhaveyya,
tika-s0304t9:3_7: tasmā paraṁ maraṇāti vuttattā tesaṁ abhāvā “abyākatameta”nti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0304t9:3_8: Yadi evaṁ tesaṁ abhāvato “na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti puṭṭhāya “āmā”ti paṭijānitabbā siyā,
tika-s0304t9:3_9: taṁ pana sattasaṅkhātassa pucchitattā na paṭiññātanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0304t9:3_10: Yena rūpenāti sattatathāgate vuttarūpaṁ sabbaññutathāgate paṭikkhipituṁ “taṁ rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0304t9:4_0: Khemāya theriyā vuttaṁ paṭhamaṁ suttaṁ bhagavato seṭṭhatthadīpanato aggapadāvacaraṁva hotīti vuttaṁ “aggapadasmi”nti.
tika-s0304t9:9_4: Yo bāhiraparikappito idha tathāgatoti vuccamāno attā.
tika-s0304t9:12_2: Yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā gacchatīti agginā kappavuṭṭhānakāle gacchati,
tika-s0304t9:12_6: Cuticittassa hi oraṁ sattarasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṁ kammajarūpaṁ cuticittena saddhiṁ nirujjhati,
tika-s0304t9:12_13: Yasmā paṭisandhikkhaṇe satto aññataraṇāya upapajjati nāma,
tika-s0304t9:15_0: 419.Tesaṁ laddhiyāti tesaṁ sassatavādānaṁ laddhiyā saddhiṁ etaṁ “atthattā”ti vacanaṁ ekaṁ abhavissa.
tika-s0304t9:15_1: Tato eva anulomaṁ taṁ nābhavissa ñāṇassāti asāraṁ etanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t9:15_2: Api nu metassāti me etassa anattāti vipassanāñāṇassa anulomaṁ api nu abhavissa,
tika-s0304t9:18_5: asati na hotī”ti ettakaṁ byākaraṇaṁ bhaveyya,
tika-s0304t9:18_7: ko pana vādo atikkante! Ito atikkante dhammadesanānaye vādoyeva vattabbameva natthīti therassa pañhabyākaraṇaṁ
